response.overview: Hussie Pass is pleased as punch to host Eva Nyx and her 1st ever BBG scene, featuring our very own Brian Omally & good friend Tony Rubino.  The lovely Kimberly Snow makes her Hussie Pass debut today, and seeing as she said she's ready for two guys, we brought in our good friend Danny Steele & new stud GI Joey for this rather wild BBG update.  Check out this new smoking hot brunette take on not one, not two, but THREE guys right here on the Hussie Pass couch. Sadie Blake shows off all her skills in this update and enjoys every last drop she amazingly takes!  Mississippi newbie Serena Hill makes her Hussie Pass debut today, and she wanted to participate in her 1st ever BBG threesome, so we brought in James Angel & Jimmy Michaels for this unique update.
response.title: Double Trouble 2
